players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch out for Diana; she's the detective."
You: "Thanks Charlie, I'll keep an eye on Diana. Anybody see Alice last night?"
Diana: "I'm Diana, the detective. Charlie confirmed he's the mafioso. Be cautious."
You: "Will keep an eye on Diana. Charlie confirmed she's the mafioso."
Charlie: "Diana likely investigated me; stay alert, Bob."
Diana: "Bob, watch out for Charlie; I'm investigating him. Stay alert."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
